section.p: The Preoperative Diagnosis Section records the surgical diagnoses assigned to the patient before the surgical procedure which are the reason for the surgery. The preoperative diagnosis is, in the surgeon's opinion, the diagnosis that will be confirmed during surgery.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-8097, CONF:1198-10439, CONF:1198-32551 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.34"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Preoperative Diagnosis Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.34)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15405)/@code="10219-4" Preoperative Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15406, CONF:1198-30863)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:1198-10096, CONF:1198-15504)
Conforms to Preoperative Diagnosis2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.65:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Preoperative Diagnosis Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.34)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15405)/@code="10219-4" Preoperative Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15406, CONF:1198-30863)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8099, R2.1=CONF:1198-8099)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8100, R2.1=CONF:1198-8100)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:1198-10096, CONF:1198-15504)
Conforms to Preoperative Diagnosis2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.65:2015-08-01)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8097, CONF:10439 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.34"
Consol Preoperative Diagnosis Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15405)/@code="10219-4" Preoperative Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15406)
Consol Preoperative Diagnosis Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8099, R2.1=CONF:1198-8099)
Consol Preoperative Diagnosis Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8100, R2.1=CONF:1198-8100)

Consol Preoperative Diagnosis Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:10096, CONF:10097) Conforms to Preoperative Diagnosis (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.65)
